Address.Address1: Rua Visconde de Jequitinhonha 1228, Boa Viagem

Description.Text: Ramada Suites Recife Boa Viagem is a modern 4-star property offering sophisticated accommodation in south Recife. Highlights include a rooftop swimming pool, a gym and a good location near the beach. Boa Viagem is an upscale neighbourhood popular for its large beach and bustling nightlife. Nearby places of interest include Shopping Center Recife and Igreja Batista Emanuel em Boa Viagem. Aeroporto metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Recife destinations. The hotel is housed in a 21st-century high-rise building with a state-of-the-art design. Facilities include a rooftop swimming pool, a gym, sauna and a shop. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe Suites are approximately 47sqm and decorated in a classic style with wood furniture and large contemporary windows. They feature a kitchenette. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, fridge, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The hotel restaurant serves Brazilian specialities and international cuisine in a relaxed setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
